A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen it 5 times.  Because I'm a lifetime Star Wars fan\, I want to like it. I keep looking for something to like\, but The Last Jedi is so bad that now I want Rey (who I thought might be interesting after The Force Awakens) to get a light saber through her skull in episode IX.  I HATE this move with the white hot heat of ten thousand suns.  Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy have murdered Star Wars.
